thread.title: Great Raft Brewing in Shreveport, Louisiana to Host Second Anniversary Party on Saturday, Oct. 10
thread.title_full: Great Raft Brewing in Shreveport, Louisiana to Host Second Anniversary Party on Saturday, Oct. 10 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Great Raft Brewing in Shreveport, Louisiana to Host Second Anniversary Party on Saturday, Oct. 10
text:
Shreveport-Bossier Convention and Tourist Bureau announces details of annual celebration featuring exclusive beers, live music, food trucks and more
Shreveport, LA (PRWEB) October 02, 2015
To celebrate the two-year anniversary of their first beer sold, Shreveport, Louisiana's Great Raft Brewing will host the Great Raft Ramble, Noon-11 p.m., Saturday, Oct. 10 at the brewery and tasting room located at 1251 Dalzell Street. Tickets are now available for the party, which will feature more than 20 beers on tap – including exclusive brews that will only be available at this event – as well as food trucks, live music and more. For a detailed list of beers being poured, or to purchase tickets, visit http://www.greatraftbrewing.com . Guests must be 21 years of age or older in order to attend.
“We couldn't be here without the support of our customers,” said Lindsay Nations, Great Raft Brewing co-founder. “The Ramble is our way of celebrating two years and thanking the customers who got us here by throwing an epic party.”
General admission tickets, which include access to the tasting room from Noon-11 p.m. and three five-ounce sample beer pours, are $10 each. VIP tickets, which include early admission beginning at 11 a.m., a keepsake anniversary glass and three sample beer pours as well as three full pours, are $40 each. New this year, a VIP Commemorative ticket including an event t-shirt, poster, commemorative glass, event access beginning at 11 a.m. and three samples as well as three full pours, is available for $60 each. Limited ticket quantities are available and advance ticket purchase is recommended.
DJ Kern Courtney will be spinning records, 1-5 p.m. Bands will perform, 6-10 p.m., in the following order: The Dubonauts, Hwy Lions, The Wall Chargers and Irene & The Sleepers. Food trucks on-site will be The Missing Link, BeauxJax Mobile Cajun Eatery and Lucky’s Po’ Boys. Dalzell Street between Southern and Samford will be blocked off during the event and event parking will be available under I-49 in the grass lot.
For more information on things to see and do in Shreveport-Bossier, visit http://www.shreveport-bossier.org or call (318) 222-9391.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13000511.htm
